name: Princess' Edge - Dragonstone
description: Hundreds years ago an ancient black dragon wreaked havoc in the realm of Arelia, bringing despair and calamity in to the land. A brave barbarian princess gifted with magic and prowess fought the dragon and used her body and soul to seal it for eternity. Or so it would seem ... a horde of dark legion managed to break the seal and free the ancient black dragon, bringing it's terror into the land once again. However a glimmer of hope remains .. unknown to them, with the destruction of the seal the brave barbarian princess also materialize once again in to this world.
